name: Peanut
description: A petite force of nature, radiating energy and setting the world aglow with fiery enthusiasm.

name: Mia
description: Effortlessly elegant, gracing surroundings with a tranquil aura and soothing presence.

name: Misty
description: A gentle soul like morning mist, casting a serene ambiance wherever it roams.

name: Marley
description: Full of boundless playfulness, turning every moment into a delightful game of joy.

name: Finn
description: Fearless explorer, leading the way to new experiences with unwavering curiosity.

name: Luna
description: Radiating an enchanting glow, lighting up the night and hearts with magical allure.

name: Toby
description: A loyal friend, providing unwavering companionship and comfort through all moments.
